hero.description: Local Secrets is not just a company: it's a pioneering project, a shared vision, and a community committed to transforming the way we explore the world. Born from the conviction that tourism can be much more than consumption and entertainment, Local Secrets leverages technology as a tool for positive impact, serving a more conscious, sustainable, and respectful tourism that honors the identity of each destination.

projectWork.title: Putting Local at the Heart of the Journey
projectWork.description: In a global context marked by mass tourism, loss of authenticity, and the precariousness of the tourism sector, Local Secrets offers a clear alternative: to give visibility to local excellence, boost the local economy, and place the true protagonists—local people and businesses—at the center of the tourism narrative. Our model is not based on commission or volume, but on recommendation, deep knowledge of places, and genuine connection with those who inhabit them.

travelers.title: A Global Network with a Local Soul
travelers.description: From over 150 destinations worldwide, Local Secrets is building a network that grows with coherence, ethics, and purpose. We are committed to a form of tourism that doesn't standardize, doesn't destroy, respects local rhythms, and generates value in every community. We achieve this through technological innovation, yes, but also through active listening, fairness, and moderation as our guiding principles.

activityBased.title: We are looking for talent eager to make a mark
activityBased.description: And that's why we want to invite talented individuals to be part of this adventure. If you are a committed, creative person with a transformative calling, here you have a space to grow, propose, and leave a lasting impact. At Local Secrets, we believe it's possible to change global tourism from a local level, and that we can only achieve this with diverse, free, and passionate teams.

benefits.title: Local Secrets: Technology for a more human and sustainable tourism
benefits.subtitle: Your well-being and happiness are our priority, and our benefits back that up. It's one of the main reasons people choose to work here.

items.title: Business proposal with an innovative approach
Attracting talent with a transformative vision

items.question: What exactly is Local Secrets and how does it work?
items.answer: Local Secrets is a global platform that promotes a more authentic and sustainable tourism by connecting travelers with places, events, and itineraries recommended by local people. We do not offer standard tourist products, but rather access to what is truly worth discovering in each destination.

items.question: How is Local Secrets different from other platforms like Tripadvisor or Google?
items.answer: Unlike large platforms based on volume and commissions, Local Secrets prioritizes qualitative recommendations, local knowledge, and a real connection with the territories. Our content is filtered and curated by local ambassadors, not by algorithms.

items.question: Who can become a Local Secrets ambassador?
items.answer: Anyone with a strong connection to their destination, a commitment to their community, and a desire to share authentic experiences and promote responsible tourism. We look for diverse profiles: from guides and entrepreneurs to creatives or passionate residents.

items.question: How is Local Secrets funded if it doesn't charge commissions?
items.answer: Our business model is based on collaborations with accommodations, territories, and brands aligned with our values. We offer visibility and connection tools, without intermediaries or extra costs for local businesses.

items.question: In which countries or cities is Local Secrets present?
items.answer: Local Secrets is active in more than 150 destinations worldwide, with a constantly expanding network. Our growth is organic, ethical, and always aligned with respect for local identity and quality content.
